welcome_p1: This test assesses your auditory short-term memory and attention.
welcome_p2: You will hear a sequence of numbers and must repeat them in the correct order. The test starts easy and becomes progressively more difficult.
microphone_permission_explanation: This test uses speech recognition. Please allow access to your microphone.
tutorial_step1_text: The computer will read you a sequence of numbers. Listen carefully and remember the order.
tutorial_step2_text: After the numbers, press 'Start Recording' and speak the numbers aloud in the same order.
tutorial_step3_text: Review your answer and click 'Submit'. The test gets harder when you answer correctly.
demo_step2: Now it's your turn! Speak the numbers aloud.
practice_complete_p1: Great job! You correctly repeated the number sequence.
practice_complete_p2: You are now ready for the actual test.
countdown_message: The test will begin shortly. Listen carefully.
listen_carefully: Listen carefully and remember the numbers...
check_answer_instruction: Check your answer and click Submit
test_failed_category: Test ended. You made three consecutive errors.
test_failed_no_sequences: Test ended. No more sequences available.
speech_recognition_not_supported: Speech recognition is not supported by your browser.
